name: slackpresence
description: Sets your Slack status to the file name and language you're working in

commands.title: Enable Slack Presence in the Current Workspace
Disable Slack Presence in the Current Workspace
Add Slack Presence to another Slack workspace

slackpresence.authTokens.description: Only modify this if you know what you are doing (most of you don't)

slackpresence.authToken.description: Deprecated: Only modify this if you know what you are doing (most of you don't)

slackpresence.enabled.description: Controls if the Slack Presence should show across all workspaces

slackpresence.shareWorkspace.description: Controls if the Slack Presence should share your workspace name

slackpresence.icon.description: The Slack status icon to use. Defaults to :spiral_note_pad:
